channel.title: Pi webclient help
channel.description:
i am having some real trouble with making a pi webclient with my official downloadable client.. can any1 help me make 1? would be greatly appreciated and i will give $20 or co-owner ingame to who ever can help me with this issue i have tried loads of guide's and jsut cannot seem to get it working - also have posted a few topics on my errors with no decent reply's on how to fix
so if any1 has the knowledge on how to make a pi-webclient without to much fuss i am in need of your help email me at sk8_allday@hotmail.com or post here
will be away from computer for the majority of today i will get back to who ever emails me or posts here and will talk on this chat or msn l8a on thanks dgk
